text:
Budget Amendment Form
Amendment Expansion of Community Wardens Amendment 6
Name: Number:
Directorate: Growth, Environment & Transport
Proposer: Mike Baldock Seconder: Mark Hood
Proposed Purpose:
Use the additional Children’s Social Care Prevention grant money (c.£550k) received in KCC's final settlement to
expand the Community Wardens scheme.
Proposed Amount Proposed Funding Source:
£550k Children's Social Care Prevention Grant
